title: By the Kynge and Quene where it is of late brought to the knowledge of the Kynge and Queenes maiesties, that many wycked and vngodly persons ... haue cõtrary to their bounden dewtyes spred and caused to be spred rumours of the decreynge or fall of the coygne or monyes commenlye called testons ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1553-1558 : Mary I)
publisher: In ædibus Iohannis Cawodi typographi Regiæ Maiestatis,
